entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH THIS MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
